processingResourceMetaData.name: cas2jdbc
processingResourceMetaData.description: This CAS consumer is able to store text analysis results via JDBC in a relational database or generate the corresponding load files. Supported databases in version 1.0 are IBM DB2 V8.2 and Oracle 10g. The usage of other than the recommended databases or JDBC drivers occurs on your own risk.

configurationParameter.name: mappingFile
configurationParameter.description: Specifies where the Cas2Jdbc consumers configuration file can be found

configurationParameter.name: encryptionClass
configurationParameter.description: Specifies (if needed) the class that is used to decrypt encrypted Cas2Jdbc configuration files

configurationParameter.name: docMetadata_Type
configurationParameter.description: Specifies which type should be used to retrieve the documents metadata

configurationParameter.name: docId_Feature
configurationParameter.description: Specifies which feature or feature path of the type defined in "docMetadata_Type" should be used to retrieve the unqiue "docId()" built-in feature

configurationParameter.name: docUri_Feature
configurationParameter.description: Specifies which feature or feature path of the type defined in "docMetadata_Type" should be used to retrieve the documents URI

configurationParameter.name: isCompleted_Feature
configurationParameter.description: Specifies which feature or feature path of the type defined in "docMetadata_Type" should be used to retrieve the information whether a chunked document is completed

configurationParameter.name: chunkNumber_Feature
configurationParameter.description: Specifies which feature or feature path of the type defined in "docMetadata_Type" should be used to retrieve sequence number of the current chunk

configurationParameter.name: collectionId
configurationParameter.description: collection Id, only necessary if cas2Jdbc is used in a multi instance way with load files.
